item.description:
Okay,

So here I am doing a search on concerts since I have not gone to one in while and I just found out that Bebel Gilberto will be in town at The Paradise Rock Club on Monday. She is a big name in Brazil and has an amazing voice. The show will start at 8:00pm with Forro in the Dark opening. The tickets are $25.00. I suggest that you get them online at Tickemaster or any other venue or get there early. Let me know if you have any questions. This will be a lot of fun!

ps. We can meet inside at 7:45 in the hall the leads to the main salon.


Ei Galera,

A Bebel Gilberto vai estar aqui na segunda-feira no Paradise Rock Club as 8. O ingresso e $25.00 mas eu sugiro comprar usando a internet (Ticketmaster.com). Vai ser 10! Eu espero ver voces la.

Mil beijos para todos,

Carolina

obs: nos podemos encotrar detro do clube entre as 7:45 antes de entrar no salao principal.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: BEBEL GILBERTO
